document.masterDocTitle: New species and records of Ischnosoma Stephens (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Tachyporinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New species and records of Ischnosoma Stephens (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Tachyporinae) from China

Remarks.
Ischnosoma duplicatum
is widely distributed from the Russian Far East and Japan southwards to Thailand , Nepal , and northern India . In China (
Fig. 66
) its distribution seems to be confined to the southern half of the country, where the species is very common. Records from Hubei, Sichuan and Zhejiang are new province records.
